letter.subject: Application for Backend Engineering Internship - Recommerce
paragraphs: I am applying for the Backend Engineering Internship - Recommerce in Helsinki. I am an IT Engineering student in Finland with a strong interest in building systems that improve customer experience and support circular economy workflows.

My current practical stack includes Go, Git, SQL, Python, and Bash. Through my studies and intensive training at KoodSisu, I have been strengthening backend fundamentals, version control and code review habits, and structured problem solving for production-oriented development.

I am also actively exploring AI-powered developer assistants to improve speed and quality in everyday engineering tasks, and I would be excited to learn from your team's practices and share effective workflows.

In addition to technical growth, my Masters in Education gives me strong communication and collaboration skills for working across backend, mobile, web, product, and analytics teams. I am available for a full-time internship from May 2026 and motivated to contribute to Zalando's Recommerce & Kids Customer Experience team.
letter.closing: I look forward to discussing this opportunity.
